resources.string: Can\'t have both size() and fullScreen() in the same sketch
size() takes either two or three parameters
fullScreen() takes either zero or one parameters
size() width and height must be integers or displayWidth and displayHeight
Can\'t have both smooth() and noSmooth() in the same sketch
smooth() takes either zero or one arguments
smooth() parameter must be an integer
Multiple libraries with same package name: %1$s
